articles.title: "Make No Mistake...": Blinken Warns Iran Against Attack On Americans - NDTV
articles.description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken warned that the US would respond "decisively" if Iran or its proxies attack Americans, the sternest warning yet as the Biden administration tries to keep Tehran from joining the war between Israel and Hamas.
articles.content:
"The United States does not seek conflict with Iran," Antony Blinken said.
